case.title: Big shoulders and deep pockets you can lean and rely upon.... - 39 (Central London)
case.text:
We are need to the help and support of other people sometimes, and perhaps these tough days more than ever....
Successful kind lovely guy is looking for one special lady....
So if you think you deserve some good luck and a good man to sprinkle some magic in your life and make everythng easier.... Write to me
